channel.title: Help plz

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @Mmmm_Java Mmmm Java
item.description:
@Mmmm_Java wrote:

change all your '||'s to '&&'s and also your command wont work the way you have it because even if you set isnpc to false when it calls process and your still wearing that stuff it will turn you back here’s how i would do it:

if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1057 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 3140 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4087 && playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1187) { npcId = 1592; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if(npcId = 1592) { isNpc = false updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
that way if you wear all that stuff you become dragon, if you take a piece off it will change you back

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz
item.dc:creator: @sp00nkitty sp00nkitty
item.description:
@sp00nkitty wrote:

ok i have added this to my server to turn me into a steel dragon if i weara red h’ween mask, d chain, d legs and d sq shield here is wat i have added and it doesnt work but it should lol here it is:

if(playerEquipment[playerHat] == 1057 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 3140 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4087 || playerEquipment[playerShield] == 1187 == true) { npcId = 1592; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

and here is the command to make u normal again:

if (command.startsWith("undragon")) { isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

Read full topic
